fields.name: Phalanx
fields.description: Phalanx is a cloud-native full-text search and indexing server written in Go built on top of Bluge that provides endpoints through gRPC and traditional RESTful API.

fields.name: Apache Solr
fields.description: Solr is highly reliable, scalable and fault tolerant, providing distributed indexing, replication and load-balanced querying, automated failover and recovery, centralized configuration and more.

fields.name: Elasticsearch
fields.description: Elasticsearch is a distributed, open source search and analytics engine for all types of data, including textual, numerical, geospatial, structured, and unstructured.

fields.name: Blast
fields.description: Blast is a full text search and indexing server, written in Go, built on top of Bleve.

fields.name: Riot
fields.description: Riot is Go Open Source, Distributed, Simple and efficient full text search engine.

fields.name: Toshi
fields.description: Toshi is meant to be a full-text search engine similar to Elasticsearch. Toshi strives to be to Elasticsearch what Tantivy is to Lucene.

fields.name: Sonic
fields.description: Sonic is a fast, lightweight and schema-less search backend.

fields.name: Tantivy
fields.description: Tantivy is a full-text search engine library inspired by Apache Lucene and written in Rust.

fields.name: Lucene
fields.description: Apache Lucene is a high-performance, full-featured text search engine library written entirely in Java.

fields.name: Bleve
fields.description: Bleve is a modern text indexing library for go.

fields.name: Whoosh
fields.description: Whoosh is a fast, pure Python search engine library.

fields.name: bluge
fields.description: modern text indexing in go - blugelabs.com

fields.name: quickwit
fields.description: Quickwit is a distributed search engine built from the ground up to offer cost-efficiency and high reliability.
